Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Gaussian kernel.

anova_bnp_normal.Rd

Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Gaussian kernel.

anova_bnp_normal(
  y,
  X,
  iter = 4000L,
  warmup = 2000L,
  seed = 1L,
  n = 50L,
  rho = 1,
  a0 = 1,
  b0 = 1,
  v0 = 2,
  r0 = 1,
  u0 = 0,
  s0 = 1
)

Arguments

y

A continuous response vector.
X

A design matrix (full of integer covariates).
iter

the total number of mcmc iterations (default 4000).
warmup

the number of warmup mcmc iterations (default 2000).
seed

the seed for random number generation (default 1L).
n

the number of points y0 for computing p(y0 | y) (default 50L). The final grid is conformed by n equispaced point from min(y) - sd(y) / 2 to max(y) - sd(y) / 2
rho

the hyperparameter \(\zeta_0\) (default 1.0).
a0

the hyperparameter \(a_0\) (default 1.0).
b0

the hyperparameter \(b_0\) (default 1.0).
v0

the hyperparameter \(v_0\) (default 2.0).
r0

the hyperparameter \(r_0\) (default 1.0).
u0

the hyperparameter \(u_0\) (default 0.0).
s0

the hyperparameter \(s_0\) (default 1.0).

Value

An object of class 'anova_bnp_model'.
